import React from "react"; import classes from "./CartDropdown.module.css"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; const CartDropdown = () => { const itemsArr = useSelector((state) => state.itemsArr); return (
My Bag, {itemsArr.length === 1 ? itemsArr.length + " Item" : itemsArr.length + " Items"}
{itemsArr.map((item, i) => (
{item.brand}
{item.name}
{item.prices[0].currency.symbol} {item.prices[0].amount}
1
))}
Total
$100.00
VIEW CART

CHECK OUT

); }; export default CartDropdown;
